title: Timerider: The Adventure of Lyle Swann (DVDRip Dual Spanish-Engl
description:
Directed in 1982 by William Dear, starring Fred (REMO Williams, TREMORS) Ward.

My own rip of the spanish DVD version.  It&#039;s encoded in PAL (wide-anamorphic), with a dual audio track (spanish-english) in 2.0.  It has no subtitles of any kind (as there weren&#039;t any on the DVD)

It&#039;s 2cd in order to achieve the maximum possible quality, though the source isn&#039;t remastered in any way.

Check IMDB for info on this movie here: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0086443/

Encoded using Auto Gordian Knot 2.48b
